name: Aaron Taylor-Johnson
description: A British actor known for his roles in action and dramatic films.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Aaron Taylor-Johnson was born in 1990 in High Wycombe, England. He began acting at a young age, appearing in television shows and stage productions. His breakout role was in the 2008 film 'Angus, Thongs, and Perfect Snogging.'

content.title: Career
content.body: Aaron Taylor-Johnson is best known for his roles in 'Kick-Ass' (2010) and its sequel, 'Kick-Ass 2' (2013), as well as playing the titular character in 'Avengers: Age of Ultron' (2015). His performance in 'Nocturnal Animals' (2016) earned him a Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actor. He often portrays complex characters in both action and dramatic genres.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Taylor-Johnson has worked with directors such as Matthew Vaughn and Joe Wright. He frequently collaborates with other actors from the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Aaron Taylor-Johnson has made a significant impact on the film industry with his versatile performances in both action blockbusters and critically acclaimed dramas. His work continues to influence aspiring actors.
